spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Run-CmdLine
spec_data.Description:
These Perl modules allow one to run TAP tests and analyze them from the
command line using the Test::Run module. It provides runprove tool with
command line facilities similar to Test::Harness' prove tool.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:07:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Run TAP tests from command line using the Test::Run module
